mapper.select: select * from jianli_tb where state not in (0)
select * from jianli_tb,role_tb,dept_tb where job_id = role_tb.role_id and role_tb.dept_id = dept_tb.dept_id and jianli_tb.state not in (0)
select * from jianli_tb,role_tb,dept_tb where job_id = role_tb.role_id and role_tb.dept_id = dept_tb.dept_id and jianli_tb.state not in (0,4,5,6)
select * from jianli_tb,role_tb,dept_tb where job_id = role_tb.role_id and role_tb.dept_id = dept_tb.dept_id and jianli_tb.state not in (0,1,2,3,6)
select * from jianli_tb,role_tb,dept_tb where job_id = role_tb.role_id and role_tb.dept_id = dept_tb.dept_id and jianli_id = #{jianliId,jdbcType=INTEGER}
select * from jianli_tb,role_tb,dept_tb where job_id = role_tb.role_id and role_tb.dept_id = dept_tb.dept_id and jianli_tb.state not in (0) limit #{pageStart},#{pageUtil.pageRows}
select * from jianli_tb,role_tb,dept_tb where job_id = role_tb.role_id and role_tb.dept_id = dept_tb.dept_id and jianli_tb.state not in (0,4,5,6) limit #{pageStart},#{pageUtil.pageRows}
